name: v1_sticker_sticker_id
description:

Feel free to contact us on Telegram: [https://t.me/somjik_tokapi](https://t.me/somjik_tokapi) #tiktok #tik #tok #tik-tok #video #music #user #feed #hashtag #challenge #trending #trend #comments #comment #image #photo #media #search #scrapper #grabber
API description: Fetches the sticker information for a given sticker ID using the TokAPI service.

sticker_id.description: The ID of the sticker to fetch information for.
